body.div: Avoid scams and fraud by dealing locally! Beware any deal involving Western Union, Moneygram, wire transfer, cashier check, money order, shipping, escrow, or any promise of transaction protection/certification/guarantee. More info
body.hr:
Date: 2012-01-06, 4:10PM EST
Reply to: job-3yxgf-2786768943@craigslist.org [Errors when replying to ads?]
Job Title: Junior SQL Server Developer
Ideal Candidate: One with existing analytical skills with Microsoft Access or Excel who is looking to expand a skillset to include transactional SQL, procedural language SQL, and broader database development and administration.
Description:
This position will be responsible to create, debug, and implement SQL Server packages to support application-specific business logic, data warehousing ETL moves, and data quality management. Data quality management includes data analysis of current data quality from existing SQL Server packages and data moves.
Required Skills:
ï¿½ Strong analytical skills using Microsoft Access or Excel
ï¿½ Fundamental understanding of relational database schemas including normalization, primary and foreign keys, constraints, and data integrity
ï¿½ Good written and verbal communication
ï¿½ Detail oriented
ï¿½ Enthusiasm for personal growth in technical proficiencies
ï¿½ Quick learner
Additional Skills:
ï¿½ TSQL and PLSQL
ï¿½ .NET and C# development
ï¿½ SQL Server database creation, maintenance, backup, and restore
Compensation: Depends on Skill Set and experience , typically starting @ $50k
Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.
Please, no phone calls about this job!
Please do not contact job poster about other services, products or commercial interests.
